__e: Hey, how the hell did you know that ghosts are scared of wrenches?

So, how did you know things changed when Captain Broderick arrived?
Did you know that the largest prime number is 1 3, 395 digits long more than the number of..
Do you know the boy you were coming here to meet tonight is only 13 years old?
I have everything I need, Daddy. Oh.
- How'd you know it was me?
Did you know he fathered a boy fourteen years ago, and he "forgot" to inform me?
So how did you know the killer's next victim would be down here and not... you know... up, uptown.
Did you know there was more to this assignment?
Did you know that there's a man much in love with you?
Did you know that ten years ago tonight, there was a horrible murder in this house?

How did you know about the time travel thing?

Okay, is it possible, Mrs. Winters that you didn't know everything about your daughter?

Were you aware that she gave your home address to a man she met online? No,no.
